A4.text: In Germany, around 1440, the goldsmith Johannes Gutenberg invented the movable-type printing press

A5.text: The Gutenberg Bible was produced in 1455

A6.text: The first precisely datable printing is Gutenberg's 31-line Indulgence which certainly existed by 22 October 1454
